channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Prevent malware from spreading by scanning cloud storage accounts on-demand
item.description:
What’s new? On-demand malware scanning now in public preview We’re excited to announce the public preview of on-demand malware scanning. Previously, customers could get malware scanning results when uploading files to Azure blob storage. Now, customers can scan existing files in storage accounts on-demand, which helps customers to gain finer control and customization for critical storage assets.
On-demand scanning allows you to scan existing files directly from Azure storage accounts What’s the relationship between Defender for Storage and Malware Scanning? Defender for Storage is the storage...
